Plot: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.
Title: A Good Year
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Albert Finney, Russell Crowe, Rafe Spall
tomatoConsensus: A Good Year is a fine example of a top-notch director and actor out of their elements, in a sappy romantic comedy lacking in charm and humor.
